alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 19 at 6:18PM PST until November 20 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures 29-32 degrees expected. * WHERE...Caruthers-San Joaquin-Selma, Delano-Wasco-Shafter and Hanford-Corcoran-Lemoore. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore
